oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of unidentified Confederate soldier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cased, hand-tinted daguerreotype is of an unidentified Confederate soldier and what appears to be his family. He is flanked by two women who have each placed a hand on his shoulder; all are seated. The decorative copper mat is oval and has a floral motif. "Kevin" is written on the reverse.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
